admin.rankingRulesHelp: In order to ensure relevant results, search responses are sorted based on a set of consecutive rules called ranking rules. For more information read the docs here:
admin.rankingRulesFormHelp: Use the following syntax for custom rules: 'attribute:asc' or 'attribute:desc'. For more information read the documentation here:
admin.stopWordsHelp: Stop words are words that will be ignored by the search engine (for English this might be for example `the`). For more information read the docs here:
admin.stopWordsFormHelp: For more information read the documentation here:
admin.synonymsHelp: Words that Meilisearch should consider as having equivalent meaning in order to make search results more relevant. For more information read the docs here:
admin.synonymsFormHelp: Add synonyms as a comma separated list (eg. 'word,utterance,phrase')
admin.typoToleranceMinWordSizeOneTypo: Minimum word size for one typo
admin.typoToleranceMinWordSizeTwoTypos: Minimum word size for two typos
admin.typoToleranceDisableOnWords: Disable typo tolerance on specified words
admin.typoToleranceDisableOnWordsHelp: Meilisearch won't apply typo tolerance on these terms. For more information see:
admin.reindexHelp: Index all posts and topics again, in case of a mismatch between Meilisearch and NodeBB. This can take a while depending on the number of posts and topics in your forum.
admin.confirmReindex:
Are you sure you want to start reindexing all posts and topics?
This operation can take a while.
